author: vkhristenko
body:
Tested/Ran runTheMatrix - all tests seem to be fine

Several Updates included:

1) Fix of the crash reported here: https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/swDevelopment/3234/1.html
Those are sitting inside the HcalDigiMonitor.h/.cc files

2) Addition of new modules:
There is an attempt currently to completely rewrite the HCALDQM CMSSW Plugins. Here, we include:
--- DQM/HcalCommon - Contains Base Classes for new HCALDQM Packages and some utilities
--- DQM/HcalTasks - To separate new(HcalTasks) HCALDQM Packages from the old(HcalMonitorTasks), all the new HCALDQM Tasks now reside in that folder. Provides analogous functionality as HcalMonitorTasks, however adds a lot of new features on top:
HF Phase Scan and HBHE Timing Monitoring wrt TCDS Shifts, etc...
---DQM/Integration/python/test: hcal_dqm python config is comletely new, however old modules are included in the Online DQM Running for now.

3) Addition to the management of the HCAL Status. Based on the plots generated in DQM/HcalTasks/pluging/HcalTimingTask, if there is a significant shift for HBHEabc partitions, the status of HBHE will be set to 0.1 respectively...

4) Addition of the HCALDQM Calibration Application: hcalcalib.... Should be running during the Abort Gap events.
title: CMSSW_7_4_X HCALDQM Updates
